page.title: 03DEREK'S MOBILE SHOP
page.content: Around{Brockton}there are no shops so we have{Derek's Mobile}Shop. It is a big,red van and it runs on Deisel oil. In the shop part there are red wire racks where all the stock goes. It sells toys,sweets,dog food, cat food, washing up liquid and lots more things. The fruit is kept under the racks and so are the vegetables. Most of those need to be weighed. The scales are electric, you plug them into the van's battery. There are some dials and buttons. The money is kept in a wooden tray under the racks. There is a small calculator till with a till roll. You pull the ticket and rip it off. The shop goes out on Wednesday Thursday and Friday each week.
